messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lew!5 and Chauffer Rodney Robinson were responding to a report at 12:31am when they discovered a victim and called for Technician Muhammad to collect evidence. Sergeant McMu11en briefed Detective M0rt0n about the incident. At 2:30AM, Technician Tamika RogeRs, Unit 5137, completed tests on witnesses. Coroner’s Office Day Records from Detective David Trehan classified the deaths as homicides. Detective Morton met with Darceleen Commodore to discuss Reynell Payne's involvement. Detective Aucoin secured a crime scene, and Detective Ryan Aucoin directed evidence collection. Units manned by Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, Detective Ananie Mitchell, and Detective Melvin McCullum were detailed. Detective Pratt handled a scene on Mazant Street. Detective Mathews compiled line-ups for witnesses. Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger was involved in sketching the scene. Orleans Parish Coroner’s Office Investigator Parnell Williams processed a scene. Detectives Barret Morton and Orlando Mathews interviewed witnesses, while Detective Morton also reviewed case files and reports.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Responded to a report and discovered a victim alongside Chauffer Rodney Robinson.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Called to the scene by Investigator Lewis to collect evidence.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Briefed Detective Morton about the incident.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Completed tests on witnesses at 2:30AM.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective David TrehanOfficer Context: His Coroner’s Office Day Records classified the deaths as homicides.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Led discussions with Darceleen Commodore regarding Reynell Payne's involvement and was briefed by Sergeant McMullen.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Secured a crime scene and directed evidence collection.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Context: Manned a unit as part of the investigation.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Context: Manned a unit as part of the
